Deleted "surprise". Use is ambiguous without stating who it was a surprise for. It was no surprise to many so the question is best left to the election article which does not consider it relevant.
grammar. Using the word "achieved" implies it was Hamas' intent to be notorious which they do not claim. Using "gained" implies it was cause and effect which is the likely situation.
Deleted accusation presented as fact. If proven true it still can't be used as it accuses Hamas of using it in defense against military targets which is legal in war.
